2_1Frg5nFndHFkmUaaGK7Qr46dRLX8a2BhBT.body:
I know only this way: 
1. Shut down zeronet 
2. In your zeronet directory, move the file data/users.json out of its folder (or rename it, e.g. users.json.billy)
3. Start zeronet 
4. Register a new username 

If you want to switch to your old username: shut down zeronet and replace the new users.json with your old one.
